values.label: Stop only for boarding
values.comment: Travel service stops at a given location, only to pick up travellers.

values.label: Stop only for alighting
values.comment: Travel service stops at a given location, only to allow disembarkation.

values.label: Technical stop, without boarding or alighting
values.comment: Location where a travel service makes a technical stop without allowing passengers to board or to disembark.

values.label: Passing location
values.comment: Location where a travel service passes without stopping.
